CheckDuplicationInsertPointIncKbn.Statement:
SELECT COUNT(point_rule_id) AS point_rule_count FROM w2_PointRule WHERE w2_PointRule.dept_id = @dept_id AND w2_PointRule.point_inc_kbn = @point_inc_kbn -- ポイント加算区分
AND w2_PointRule.priority = @priority_chk -- 優先度 AND w2_PointRule.point_rule_kbn = '02' -- キャンペーン AND w2_PointRule.point_kbn = '01' -- 通常ポイント

CheckDuplicationModifyPointIncKbn.Statement:
SELECT COUNT(point_rule_id) AS point_rule_count FROM w2_PointRule WHERE w2_PointRule.dept_id = @dept_id AND w2_PointRule.point_rule_id != @point_rule_id AND w2_PointRule.point_inc_kbn = @point_inc_kbn -- ポイント加算区分
AND w2_PointRule.priority = @priority_chk -- 優先度 AND w2_PointRule.point_rule_kbn = '02' -- キャンペーン AND w2_PointRule.point_kbn = '01' -- 通常ポイント
